Package com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.exception_handling

Class CommonAdvice

java.lang.Object
com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.exception_handling.CommonAdvice
@ControllerAdvice public class CommonAdvice extends Object
Global exception handling advice for the application. Handles exceptions thrown by services and provides a consistent response format.

      @ExceptionHandler(UserAlreadyExistsException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response> handleException(UserAlreadyExistsException e)
      Exception handler for when attempting to create a user that already exists.
      Parameters:
      e - The exception thrown when attempting to create an existing user.
      Returns:
      A response with an error message and HTTP status 400 (Bad Request).
